Sentence: The groups were: a reference group fed a regular ( low - fat) chow, reference group of AIA rats, a group of AIA rats receiving Lactobacillus casei ( 2 * 108 CFU / d), a group of AIA rats receiving methotrexate ( MTX, 7. 6mg / kg / week), a group of AIA rats receiving GJK ( 24 g / kg / d), and a group of AIA rats receiving ZQFTN ( 50mg / kg / d).
